 yet cautiously looks around before doing anything, and also remembering th=
at it was not wise to move an injured person, especially if they had any un=

uries.

 side.

As Tuscon get's close to the figure it began to stir. Tuscon's scan=
s
show light damage to the figure's systems, but that its repair systems
ha=
ve been taxed hard, evidently it had been much more heavily damaged
but sel=
f repair circuits had brought it back to a more balanced state.

The figure=
 began to stir, perhaps its proximate sensors were reacting
to Tuscon's pre=
sence. The figure looked to be an older male, perhaps
with some sort of gro=
und based vehicular form based on its shape and
configuarion.

The figure s=
uddenly sat up and slid into a corner, "Who are you?" he
said in a raspy bu=
t definitly male voice. The hum of a laser gun could
be heard as he pulled =
a weapon out and aimed it at Tuscon, "Get back,

Outside t=
he sounds of metal on metal could be heard as the creatures
